Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Marriott Moscow Grand Hotel, you'll be centrally located in Moscow, steps from Tchaikovsky Concert Hall and minutes from Mossovet Theatre. This 5-star hotel is close to Red Square and Moscow Kremlin.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 387 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and plasma televisions. Satellite programming and DVD players are provided for your entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and complimentary newspapers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find a health club, an indoor pool, and a sauna. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands.

Dining
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, express check-in, and express check-out. Planning an event in Moscow? This hotel has 9203 square feet (855 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center and conference space. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Marriott Moscow Grand Hotel, you'll be centrally located in Moscow, steps from Tchaikovsky Concert Hall and minutes from Mossovet Theatre. This 5-star hotel is close to Red Square and Moscow Kremlin.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Tchaikovsky Concert Hall - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Mossovet Theatre - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Praktika Theater - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Bulgakov Museum - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Lenkom Theatre - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Pushkin Square - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Glinka National Museum Consortium of Musical Culture - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Yeliseyev Grocery Store - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Patriarch's Pond - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Novaya Opera Theatre - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Hermitage Garden - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Stanislavski and Nemirovich-Danchenko Moscow Academic Music Theatre - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Moscow Museum of Modern Art - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Vysokopetrovsky Monastery - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Theatre on Malaya Bronnaya - 1 km / 0.6 mi

The preferred airport for Marriott Moscow Grand Hotel is Moscow (SVO-Sheremetyevo) - 24.9 km / 15.4 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Marriott Moscow Grand Hotel is Moscow (SVO-Sheremetyevo) - 24.9 km / 15.4 mi.

Message.Text:
Essential Information:
Please note: For Dynamic bookings only: Please note that if the rate is inclusive of breakfast, this will only be provided for maximum number of 2 guests regardless of how many guests are confirmed for the room. Additional guests will have to pay for the breakfast charge directly to hotel. Extra Bed Policy: Additional charges may apply. Applicable from 01/Jan/0001 to 31/Dec/9999

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.
